io.jeo.geojson

Class GeoJSONReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.geojson.GeoJSONReader

  • public class GeoJSONReader
extends Object
    GeoJSON reader class.

    See GeoJSON Specification.

    Methods of this class take any input that be converted to a Reader. See the Convert.toReader(Object) method for details on accepted inputs.

    Example: 

    
 GeoJSONReader reader = new GeoJSONReader();
 reader.read("{ 'type': 'Point', coordinates: [1.0, 2.0] }");

    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, Boundless
